verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:1
verses.text: And it came to pass, when the king sat in his house, and the Lord had given him rest round about from all his enemies;

verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:2
verses.text: That the king said unto Nathan the prophet, See now, I dwell in an house of cedar, but the ark of God dwelleth within curtains.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:3
verses.text: And Nathan said to the king, Go, do all that is in thine heart; for the Lord is with thee.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:4
verses.text: And it came to pass that night, that the word of the Lord came unto Nathan, saying,
